name: crimes_at_location
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool data_police_uk.
Tool description: This is the unofficial documentation for the Data.Police.UK API.
API description: Returns just the crimes which occurred at the specified location, rather than those within a radius. If given latitude and longitude, finds the nearest pre-defined location and returns the crimes which occurred there.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve crime data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
